content.body:
This article covers how to add a Privacy Policy link to your account. This field must be filled out with a valid URL in order to send review invitations from the Yext platform.





To add a Review Generation Privacy Policy Link:





1. Click **Reviews** in the navigation bar and click **Generation**.
2. Click **Settings**.
3. Click on the **Review Generation Privacy Policy** field and add your Privacy Policy link to the text box.
4. Click **Save**.
